scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root -v run lint
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root -v run test
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -t --exclude root -v run build
scripts.ci: yarn run build && yarn run lint && yarn run test
scripts.chromatic: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root -v run chromatic
scripts.watch: yarn workspaces foreach -t --exclude root -v -p -i run watch
scripts.semantic-release:prepare: yarn workspaces foreach -t --exclude root -v exec semantic-release -e semantic-release-monorepo
scripts.semantic-release:publish: yarn workspaces foreach -t --exclude root -v exec semantic-release -e semantic-release-monorepo
scripts.semantic-release: yarn run semantic-release:prepare && yarn run semantic-release:publish
